recipe.title: Cabbage and Asian Pear Slaw
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives, plus more
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Mix together buttermilk, mayonnaise, sour cream, vinegar, 1 tablespoon chives, and 1/2 teaspoon poppy seeds; season with salt and pepper. Toss with cabbage, pear, and onion; season with salt and pepper. Serve slaw topped with more chives and poppy seeds.
